frenzy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a state of great anxiety or excitement, in which you cannot control your behaviour
frenzy.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Doreen had worked herself into a frenzy.
The women were screaming and in a frenzy to get home.
frenzy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a time when people do a lot of things very quickly
